ing: 1/4 cup unsweetened applesauce, or to taste
des: "This quick, frosty blender recipe has a thick texture, beautiful colors, and a fruity, mojito-like taste."
ins: Place frozen grapes, applesauce, and lime juice into a blender. Puree until smooth. Add frozen strawberries, cubed pineapple, and mint leaves. Pulse a few times until the strawberries and pineapple are in small bits.
